applicationInfo.title: Java Full Stack Software Engineer - SaaS, Enterprise Products

tasks: Designing and developing network performance monitoring applications using full-stack Java technologies.
Incorporate feedback from clients and end-users throughout the software development lifecycle.
Developing software, coding, and designing systems in enterprise-grade products.
Working on cutting-edge products to be used by large corporations throughout the world.
Collaborating with Product Management and other cross-functional teams.
Competitive Salary: $90 - 130k + bonus + RSU's (Total Comp: $130-180k) (Potential to go higher based on experience)
Small company culture with large company resources
Email Your Resume In Word To
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : CM14-1755889 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
